00016 #ifndef __USBREG_H
00017 #define __USBREG_H
00018 
00019 /* Device Interrupt Bit Definitions */
00020 #define FRAME_INT           0x00000001
00021 #define EP_FAST_INT         0x00000002
00022 #define EP_SLOW_INT         0x00000004
00023 #define DEV_STAT_INT        0x00000008
00024 #define CCEMTY_INT          0x00000010
00025 #define CDFULL_INT          0x00000020
00026 #define RxENDPKT_INT        0x00000040
00027 #define TxENDPKT_INT        0x00000080
00028 #define EP_RLZED_INT        0x00000100
00029 #define ERR_INT             0x00000200
00030 
00031 /* Rx & Tx Packet Length Definitions */
00032 #define PKT_LNGTH_MASK      0x000003FF
00033 #define PKT_DV              0x00000400
00034 #define PKT_RDY             0x00000800
00035 
00036 /* USB Control Definitions */
00037 #define CTRL_RD_EN          0x00000001
00038 #define CTRL_WR_EN          0x00000002
00039 
00040 /* Command Codes */
00041 #define CMD_SET_ADDR        0x00D00500
00042 #define CMD_CFG_DEV         0x00D80500
00043 #define CMD_SET_MODE        0x00F30500
00044 #define CMD_RD_FRAME        0x00F50500
00045 #define DAT_RD_FRAME        0x00F50200
00046 #define CMD_RD_TEST         0x00FD0500
00047 #define DAT_RD_TEST         0x00FD0200
00048 #define CMD_SET_DEV_STAT    0x00FE0500
00049 #define CMD_GET_DEV_STAT    0x00FE0500
00050 #define DAT_GET_DEV_STAT    0x00FE0200
00051 #define CMD_GET_ERR_CODE    0x00FF0500
00052 #define DAT_GET_ERR_CODE    0x00FF0200
00053 #define CMD_RD_ERR_STAT     0x00FB0500
00054 #define DAT_RD_ERR_STAT     0x00FB0200
00055 #define DAT_WR_BYTE(x)     (0x00000100 | ((x) << 16))
00056 #define CMD_SEL_EP(x)      (0x00000500 | ((x) << 16))
00057 #define DAT_SEL_EP(x)      (0x00000200 | ((x) << 16))
00058 #define CMD_SEL_EP_CLRI(x) (0x00400500 | ((x) << 16))
00059 #define DAT_SEL_EP_CLRI(x) (0x00400200 | ((x) << 16))
00060 #define CMD_SET_EP_STAT(x) (0x00400500 | ((x) << 16))
00061 #define CMD_CLR_BUF         0x00F20500
00062 #define DAT_CLR_BUF         0x00F20200
00063 #define CMD_VALID_BUF       0x00FA0500
00064 
00065 /* Device Address Register Definitions */
00066 #define DEV_ADDR_MASK       0x7F
00067 #define DEV_EN              0x80
00068 
00069 /* Device Configure Register Definitions */
00070 #define CONF_DVICE          0x01
00071 
00072 /* Device Mode Register Definitions */
00073 #define AP_CLK              0x01
00074 #define INAK_CI             0x02
00075 #define INAK_CO             0x04
00076 #define INAK_II             0x08
00077 #define INAK_IO             0x10
00078 #define INAK_BI             0x20
00079 #define INAK_BO             0x40
00080 
00081 /* Device Status Register Definitions */
00082 #define DEV_CON             0x01
00083 #define DEV_CON_CH          0x02
00084 #define DEV_SUS             0x04
00085 #define DEV_SUS_CH          0x08
00086 #define DEV_RST             0x10
00087 
00088 /* Error Code Register Definitions */
00089 #define ERR_EC_MASK         0x0F
00090 #define ERR_EA              0x10
00091 
00092 /* Error Status Register Definitions */
00093 #define ERR_PID             0x01
00094 #define ERR_UEPKT           0x02
00095 #define ERR_DCRC            0x04
00096 #define ERR_TIMOUT          0x08
00097 #define ERR_EOP             0x10
00098 #define ERR_B_OVRN          0x20
00099 #define ERR_BTSTF           0x40
00100 #define ERR_TGL             0x80
00101 
00102 /* Endpoint Select Register Definitions */
00103 #define EP_SEL_F            0x01
00104 #define EP_SEL_ST           0x02
00105 #define EP_SEL_STP          0x04
00106 #define EP_SEL_PO           0x08
00107 #define EP_SEL_EPN          0x10
00108 #define EP_SEL_B_1_FULL     0x20
00109 #define EP_SEL_B_2_FULL     0x40
00110 
00111 /* Endpoint Status Register Definitions */
00112 #define EP_STAT_ST          0x01
00113 #define EP_STAT_DA          0x20
00114 #define EP_STAT_RF_MO       0x40
00115 #define EP_STAT_CND_ST      0x80
00116 
00117 /* Clear Buffer Register Definitions */
00118 #define CLR_BUF_PO          0x01
00119 
00120 
00121 /* DMA Interrupt Bit Definitions */
00122 #define EOT_INT             0x01
00123 #define NDD_REQ_INT         0x02
00124 #define SYS_ERR_INT         0x04
00125
